Please read below carefully and ensure teams are informed of the same. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you are traveling within US on vacations, please ensure to inform your EPAM Product Delivery Manager to ensure delivery impact could be determined and communicated upfront to Edward Jones. EPAM Product Delivery managers to inform Edward Jones stakeholders with a clear impact definition due to travel. Edward Jones currently has a cap of 2 weeks of vacation, any more time than 2 weeks needs specific conversations and could lead to we finding a potential replacement for the duration, to be dealt on a case by case basis.  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you plan to travel to India for personal or Visa appointments, make sure  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Inform your EPAM PDM minimum 6 weeks in advance for formal approval.  Edward Jones has a cap of 2 weeks of vacation, anything more than that needs specific conversation and approvals.  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ensure you have approval from Global Mobility team to address any risk related to Work Authorization. People are not approved to travel without a Visa appointment, in case they need one.  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you plan to work from India, approved working hours are CST timezone ( 8 am to 5 pm) or ( 9 am to 6 pm). Any exceptions need to be formally communicated and agreed upon.  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All the “travel to India” communication to be routed to Principal DM (Reema Soni) and Account Manager (Fuzail Jaffar) who will then work with Vendor Management to get the required approvals in place \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you plan to travel to Canada and would want to work from there, it would follow the same process as travel to India, no exceptions there. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Travel to any other location, other than India and Canada needs to be informed to EPAM PDMs to assess the delivery impact. Under no circumstances, people are allowed to work from any other location other than India, Canada and US.  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Remote working requests should be logged and pre approved here -\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epa.ms/RemoteWorkRequest\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" https://epa.ms/RemoteWorkRequest\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"DM’s\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", once you receive Travel/Work  from India request, please, add it to the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epam.sharepoint.com/:x:/r/sites/EPAMEdwardJonesDMPM/Shared Documents/General/Vacation Remote Work Tracking.xlsx?d=w829c0c4c7b9444e194e0f40e4cd110ad&csf=1&web=1&e=IIKlaH\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"document\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and keep updated with approval details. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}}"
